ing: 1 tablespoon ground cumin, or more to taste
des: "This is perfect for kabobs! We generally use chicken or pork and it is great with onions, zucchini, and portobello mushrooms! You'll wow your crowd with this one! This is enough marinade for 2 pounds of meat and the veggies."
ins: Whisk honey, soy sauce, chili sauce, cumin, and vegetable oil together in a bowl.
